We're on the

For a cheerful, friendly Customer Service Advisor to come and join us in the Next Directory.




  • You’ll be our customers’ first point of contact when they get in touch with us so we’ll be looking to you to provide a sincere response.
  • We have customers calling in with a variety of queries, from a missing package to an incorrect product. You’ll quickly realise that no two customers are the same!

We're on the

for resourceful, helpful people who like to lead by example and inspire those around them.

  • Nothing makes you happier than knowing that you’ve made a difference to someone’s day, be it a member of your team or one of our customers.
  • As a Customer Service Manager at our Next Directory you’ll find that no two days are the same and your day is always varied and stimulating.
